Education.title: Facilitation For All
Education.description: A training course aimed at supporting youth workers and leaders in developing competencies for creating and facilitating inclusive activities for young people.

Education.title: SPEAK-UP Youth Exchange
Education.description: An Erasmus+ Youth Exchange designed to empower youth through digital and visual storytelling, fostering leadership and intercultural skills.

Education.title: The Greench Training Course
Education.description: An educational mobility for youth workers focusing on sustainability, environmental consciousness, and green innovation.

Education.title: Digital Womunication
Education.description: A project aimed at improving the employability of women from rural backgrounds by equipping them with essential digital communication skills.

Education.title: VT4Y – Visual Thinking 4 Youth
Education.description: A project promoting visual thinking as a tool for youth to enhance creativity, problem-solving skills, and effective communication.

Education.title: Feminism is for Everybody
Education.description: The “Feminism is for Everybody” training course aims to empower youth workers from across Europe and neighboring regions to integrate feminist values and gender equality principles into their work with young people.

Internships.title: Klimt02 Internship
Internships.description: Klimt02 is offering students of Master's or Bachelor's degrees the opportunity to undertake internships for a period of 4 to 6 months.

Internships.title: Design Internship
Internships.description: Join our creative team as a design intern.

Internships.title: Marketing Internship
Internships.description: Help develop strategies with our marketing team.

Internships.title: Regional Internship Program
Internships.description: Paid internship in civil society organizations from Western Balkans.

Internships.title: Internship Program in Belgrade
Internships.description: Breaking Borders, Building Bonds Cross-Border Internship Program. We're thrilled to introduce a groundbreaking opportunity!

Internships.title: Human Resources Internship
Internships.description: Assist in recruitment, training, and employee development.

Open Calls for Students.title: Hackathon 2024
Open Calls for Students.description: Participate in a global hackathon event.

Open Calls for Students.title: Startup Bootcamp
Open Calls for Students.description: Learn how to pitch your ideas to investors.

Open Calls for Students.title: Student Research Grant
Open Calls for Students.description: Apply for funding for your academic research.

Volunteering.title: Community Clean-Up
Volunteering.description: Help clean and beautify our local community.

Volunteering.title: Teaching Program
Volunteering.description: Teach underprivileged children in remote areas.

Volunteering.title: Environmental Project
Volunteering.description: Work with a team to promote sustainability.
